DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial evaluate community-based effectiveness virtual reality job interview training ( VR-JIT ) . Northwestern University partner Thresholds Inc. evaluate effectiveness VR-JIT improve interview skill access employment . In addition , evaluate cost effectiveness VR-JIT process implement VR-JIT Thresholds .
